Articles.Content:
You forgot to close the sink.

Overwater Supernautica Dome.

I use the un-shrink-inator ray to enlarge my bathtub, sealed shut of course, and place the Subnati-Dome in it.

My Hill.

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, AtomicTech said:
> 
> 
> tanks
> 

I only have one.

Makes rocket, leaves, goes to Mars, builds invincible orbital defense network, hundreds of defensive lines, heavily defended by anti aircraft guns, all centered around Arsira Mons, with a bunker and life support systems, making this, **MY HILL.**

Go away please.   

Let me keep my hill, given that I could annihilate you with thermonuclear warheads otherwise.

~~If this doesn’t work, I could always just go to Venus.~~

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-02T01:11:38Z" title="10/02/2021 01:11  AM" data-short="2 yr">October 2, 2021</time> by Admiral Fluffy**
  
I might let you in if you ask nicely

I simply use transporters from Star Trek to teleport past the defenses. Then i hack into them and turn them loyal to me.

**MY HILL.**

And what's more, i have those sweet-sweet defenses to enforce it being

**MY HILL**

**Edited <time datetime="2021-10-02T07:25:29Z" title="10/02/2021 07:25  AM" data-short="2 yr">October 2, 2021</time> by Maria Sirona**

The Hill class is suddenly redefined to be a singleton.

All hills become the references to the Singleton Hill.
**MY SINGLETON REFERENCE HILL**
Uses my secret codes to kick you out of my Martian hill, making it my hill once again.

Unbeknownst to you, there was a virus embeded in your secret codes and now Skynet has taken over.

**EVIL CREATOR OF TERMINATORS HILL.**

Terminator is a line of sunset on the celestial body.

Sunset Hill.

I remotely tap to the Terminator's programming and hack him into terminating himself.

**MY HILL**

Terminator terminated.

Spoiler

![The Walking Dead filming locations in Georgia](https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/ajc/CS5AW7446XI6ERI4KJ6KNXXQZU.png)

Terminus Hill

No, as i said, terminating the terminator takes it for me.

**STILL MY HILL**

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, Maria Sirona said:
> 
> 
> No, as i said, terminating the terminator takes it for me.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **STILL MY HILL**
> 

Nope. You forgot it was Skynet that took over not a Terminator, so.

**STILL SKYNET'S HILL, WHO HAS NOW SENT HUNTER KILLERS AFTER YOUR FORCES.**

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, ColdJ said:
> 
> 
> Nope. You forgot it was Skynet that took over not a Terminator, so.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **STILL SKYNET'S HILL, WHO HAS NOW SENT HUNTER KILLERS AFTER YOUR FORCES.**
> 

I borrow some powers from Bill Wurtz and... Not anymore there's a blanket

On **MY HILL, COVERED WITH A BLANKET**

~~Galadriel~~ Alatariel comes from ~~Lorien~~ Laurelindorenan and takes the blanket.

Spoiler

![ccf9fc4294a52f75b7be4af2d55026d4.jpg](https://i.pinimg.com/originals/cc/f9/fc/ccf9fc4294a52f75b7be4af2d55026d4.jpg)

Blanchett Hill

YOU FOOLS! YOU FORGOT YOUR HELMETS!!!!  

MY HILL!

Maybe we forgot the helmets, but not the helminths.

Inner World Hill.

I turn everything inside out. Now it is outer world hill and it is 

**MY HILL**

I use the infinity stones to warp the fabric of space and time. I restart the universe and create a planet with lots of hills, guarded by the Kraken. Only [@Just Jim](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/148725-just-jim/), can get past my defenses.

**MY PLANET O' HILLS**

Except everything is still turned inside out and ya can't use those stones for anything because you're busy having been turned inside out. Still

**MY HILL**

> 
> 
> 8 minutes ago, Maria Sirona said:
> 
> 
> Except everything is still turned inside out and ya can't use those stones for anything because you're busy having been turned inside out. Still
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
> **MY HILL**
> 

But you see, Infinity Stones.

**MY PLANET O' HILLS**

But using the infinity stones killed you, leaving the hills wide open.

**MY HILLS.**
Openfinity Hills.

Enjoying

**MY OPENFINITY HILLS.**

I close the hills and take 'em for myself with the help of the plutoans.

**MY CLOSED INFINITY HILLS**
